summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Water Department; amending Sections 21.04.190 and 21.04.470 and repealing Sections 21.04.280 and 21.04.290 of the Seattle Municipal Code, Sections 11 and 36, 20 and 21, of Ordinance 65877 as amended, to permit use of a standard charge based on prevailing actual costs for water shut off.
